sentences.en: Anna was born in 1923 in Ardwick, a suburb of Manchester.
sentences.cn: 安娜于1923年出生在曼彻斯特的郊区阿德维克。

sentences.en: Disneyland is in Los Angeles suburb.
sentences.cn: 迪斯尼游乐场在洛杉矶的近郊.

sentences.en: Factories are grouped in the southern suburb of the city.
sentences.cn: 工厂都集中在城市的南郊.

sentences.en: Fontbonne is a liberal arts college, located in a residential suburb of St. Louis.
sentences.cn: 芳邦大学是一所文科大学，位于圣路易斯市郊的居民区。

sentences.en: He lives in the suburb of Beijing and works in the city.
sentences.cn: 他住在北京郊区,而在城里工作.

sentences.en: His ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
sentences.cn: 他的耳朵对伦敦郊区的语音仍然一听就能辨别.

sentences.en: In another suburb the hour was counted out, though so remotely.
sentences.cn: 在市郊的另一头,声声钟鸣, 依稀缥缈.

sentences.en: Margaret resides with her invalid mother in a London suburb.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特同她病弱的母亲住在伦敦郊区。

sentences.en: She's renting in some grey suburb of Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 她租住在伯明翰某处阴沉沉的郊区.

sentences.en: The town is a residential suburb.
sentences.cn: 这个小镇是市郊住宅区.

sentences.en: The two roads intersect at the suburb of the city.
Their ears were still attuned to the sounds of the London suburb.
sentences.cn: 他们依然很熟悉伦敦市郊的喧闹声。

sentences.en: Toward the suburb the houses begin to thin out.
sentences.cn: 靠近市郊的地方房屋渐渐稀少.

sentences.en: We can go to the arboretum in the southern suburb.
sentences.cn: 我们可以去南郊的植物园.

trans.tran_cn: 郊区，城郊，边缘，附近，周围
trans.tran_en: an area where people live which is away from the centre of a town or city
